# Astro Portfolio & Blog - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Personal portfolio and blog website for Truong Phi An built with Astro framework.

## Project Status: ✅ COMPLETED

All setup tasks have been completed successfully. The website is ready for development and customization.

## Checklist
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Astro project structure
- [x] Customize portfolio and blog features
- [x] Install dependencies and compile
- [x] Create and run dev server task
- [x] Finalize documentation

## Technical Stack
- Astro 5.x (Static Site Generator)
- TypeScript (strict mode)
- Tailwind CSS 4.x
- MDX for blog posts
- Content Collections

## Color Scheme
- Primary: #3b82f6 (Blue)
- Secondary: #10b981 (Green)
- Accent: #f59e0b (Amber)
- Theme: Light mode only

## Features Implemented
- ✅ Homepage with hero section and quick info cards
- ✅ About page with full CV (experience, skills, education, certifications)
- ✅ Projects page showcasing featured work
- ✅ Contact page with contact information
- ✅ Blog system with existing sample posts
- ✅ Responsive navigation with mobile menu
- ✅ Modern footer with social links
- ✅ Tailwind CSS styling
- ✅ SEO optimization with sitemap
- ✅ RSS feed support

## Development

The dev server is running at `http://localhost:4321`

To start development:
1. Run `npm run dev` to start the dev server
2. Edit files in `src/` directory
3. Blog posts are in `src/content/blog/`
4. Portfolio data is in `src/data/portfolio.ts`

## Next Steps

You can now:
- Customize the design and colors in `src/styles/global.css`
- Add your own blog posts in `src/content/blog/`
- Update portfolio information in `src/data/portfolio.ts`
- Add images to the `public/` directory
- Customize components in `src/components/`
